# Neil Sandoz — Film Editor

Neil Sandoz is a film editor and storyteller based in Austin, Texas.

He specializes in documentary, commercial, and nonprofit filmmaking, with 15+ years of experience working across the globe — including Kenya, Egypt, Ethiopia, Madagascar, and the United States.

Neil is available for freelance and full-time editing work in Austin, Texas and remotely worldwide.

## Skills
- Film Editing (Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro)
- Documentary Editing
- Commercial Video Editing
- Motion Design & Animation
- Sound Design & Music Supervision
- Color Grading
- Project Management & Creative Direction
- Camera Operation & Direction
